name: Multi SMTP
author: Subin Siby

sections.description:
Add multiple SMTP servers and let WordPress send email through each server one by one taking turns.

Cycle between multiple SMTP servers for sending emails through WordPress. By doing this, you can increase the number of emails you can send alltogether.

Donate

If you found this plugin helpful, please consider a donation to support me.
http://subinsb.com/donate

Support

If you want help, you can use the WordPress Support Forum or you can seek help via comments section of http://subinsb.com/multi-smtp
sections.installation:
1. Upload multi-smtp to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

More details : http://subinsb.com/multi-smtp
sections.faq:
No questions has been asked yet.

If you have a question, ask in the comments of http://subinsb.com/multi-smtp or via WordPress support forum.
